instructions: Enter your name and start the game.
You will see 20 numbers. Your task is to classify each number into the correct category (e.g., Rational, Irrational, Integer, etc.).
Click a number to select it, then click the category where it belongs.
If you make a mistake, you can move numbers between categories.
When you finish, click the Submit button to see your results and score.
Try to get as many correct as possible and see your name on the leaderboard!
